name: Pokémon Omicron
summary:
A fan game created by and for pokemon fans.
In this game, you are escaping from the Olympus team, commanded by Zeus, who sized your hometown.

Introducing two new regions, 16 medals, all pokemons until the 5th generation (and some of the 6th) and many, MANY new stuff not seen in the original games.

Counterpart of Pokemon Zeta.
